db:abstract.db:para: A radio button with a text label.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: RadioButton is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A RadioButton is an option button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Radio buttons typically present the user with a "one of many" choices. In a group of radio buttons, only one radio button can be checked at a time; if the user selects another button, the previously selected button is switched off.
You can create a custom appearance for a RadioButton by assigning a RadioButtonStyle.

db:section.db:title: activeFocusOnPress : bool
db:section.db:para: This property is true if the control takes the focus when it is pressed; forceActiveFocus() will be called on the control.

db:section.db:title: checked : bool
db:section.db:para: This property is true if the control is checked.

db:section.db:title: exclusiveGroup : ExclusiveGroup
db:section.db:para: This property stores the ExclusiveGroup that the control belongs to.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] hovered : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether the control is being hovered.

db:section.db:title: pressed : bool
db:section.db:para: This property is true if the control is being pressed. Set this property to manually invoke a mouse click.

db:section.db:title: style : Component
db:section.db:para: The style Component for this control.

db:member.db:link: Qt Quick Controls Styles QML Types

db:section.db:title: text : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the text that the label should display.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.7] tooltip : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the button tooltip.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.7.

db:section.db:title: clicked()
db:section.db:para: Emitted whenever the control is clicked.
